system.effect: Gardens to grow food in and relax. Double Time ship can remain in the void without suffering Population or Morale Loss. Increase Crew Population by +2 Permenantly. Only one per vessel.

description.value: Gardens to grow food in and relax. Double Time ship can remain in the void without suffering Population or Morale Loss. Increase Crew Population by +2 Permenantly. Only one per vessel.
